Action.author: davidkel
Action.body: The fabric-ca-client shares files from fabric-client. ie the fabric-client is the single source point and fabric-ca-client must take a copy of these files. fabric-ca-client is meant to be standalone and so shouldn't reference the fabric-client versions. There is a gulp task `ca` which needs to be run first before working with the node-sdk source. This prepares the fabric-ca-client source appropriately for use.

Action.author: akarshagrawal792
Action.body: Oh Sure. Then it makes all the way more sense to have it that way. I think I didn't run the `gulp ca` task before running the SDK and hence the error.

Action.author: davidkel
Action.body: Provided information back to reporter who was happy with the response.
